items.sentence: You're going somewhere this afternoon, aren't you?
Tom's shortcut to school involved hopping a fence.
Are you sure that you want to continue doing this?
Somebody crashed into me on my way home yesterday.
Tom decided that he was too old for rock climbing.
Tom won't be able to finish doing that by himself.
Tom turned out to be the one who stole my tractor.
I have to get to sleep! I've got classes tomorrow.
Could you help me clean up a bit before you leave?
I didn't know you'd be through doing that by 2:30.
Tom has unknowingly broken more than a few hearts.
I tried to do everything that I could to stop Tom.
Everyone in my family wears glasses except for me.
That's not the main reason why Tom should do that.
That's not the main reason why Tom has to do that.
I decided to leave my job at the end of the month.
I want to find a blonde, blue-eyed European woman.
You always make such a big deal out of everything.
I can't buy anything until I get my next paycheck.
Put everything you want to throw away in this box.
I'll send you a copy of my plans as soon as I can.
All the stories that Tom told us were interesting.
This is the camera that Tom took the picture with.
This is the first time I've eaten Indonesian food.
I plan to stay at Tom's house when I visit Boston.
Put this in the refrigerator, so it doesn't spoil.
Count me out if that's what you're planning to do.
Tom attributed his failure in the exam to illness.
A good student like Tom brings honor to our class.
Did Tom drink the whole bottle of wine by himself?
I couldn't help but be impressed by Tom's courage.
I don't believe Tom really wants to do that today.
I don't think Tom is saying what he really thinks.
I'm the one who warned Tom that this might happen.
I've persuaded Tom to stay in Boston until Monday.
It was dark and I couldn't see what Tom was doing.
It's a risk that Tom and I aren't willing to take.
No matter what you say, I won't change my opinion.
The hummingbird is the smallest bird in the world.
Will this set a good precedent or a bad precedent?
The whale shark doesn't pose any danger to humans.
Tom and John are twins, and so are Mary and Alice.
I've grown tired of drinking wine. Give me a beer.
Tom realized that he no longer needed to be there.
Tom is in the process of setting up a new company.
Do you think that this might be Tom's handwriting?
Things didn't go as badly as Tom thought they did.
Knowledge without common sense counts for nothing.
All the members of the committee hate one another.
Will we be in time for the beginning of the party?
